ygData.subject: Re: Question for $$ and goods
ygData.msgSnippet: Hmm... As a lv 4 player, I had about... 2 plats to my name. When I hit level 6 though, that s when I got all the BIG money. Now I m in Rivervale and I have
ygData.messageBody:
Hmm... As a lv 4 player, I had about... 2 plats
to my name. When I hit level 6 though, that's when I
got all the BIG money. Now I'm in Rivervale and I
have currently 50 plats to my name. Would have more,
but 9th level spells are expensive fer a Druid... :O
..(specially when you buy every one...)<br><br> How did I make
all this money?<br><br> Hmm.. well, since I'm a Druid
I gave heals at the Wall. I never asked for
donations, but people gave me money anyway. And also I sang
songs for them. That earned me even more
money....<br><br> ..And though I'm a Druid, I must say, when you
get to a higher level kill some bears. High Quality
Bear Skins can be sold for 15PP sometimes
more...<br><br> ..But... Just work on killing all you can, and
save some money in the bank.<br><br> And basically,
this didn't help much at all....<br><br> But ah.. read
the other's posts! They seem to know what they're
talking about! :) ? <br><br> and I know this says I'm
replying to someone else, but I was too lazy to go back
and type on another post....<br><br> so.. For the
person worried about money: Don't sweat it!<br><br>
Teppeny<br> Druid of the 10th<br> Tunare
